title: Stephanie Wittels Wachs | A Closer Look: Trump, Parkland and the #NeverAgain Movement
description:
In today's episode, Seth takes a closer look at the Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School shooting and how the #NeverAgain movement continues to put pressure on Republicans and the NRA.

Then, Stephanie Wittels Wachs talks about her brother, comedian and writer Harris Wittels, his struggle with addiction and her memoir, Everything Is Horrible and Wonderful.

She then goes behind the scenes and takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night producer Kevin Miller.

LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
